problem.p: A closed system contains a gas at a pressure of 200 kPa in a cylinder piston arrangement. The area of the piston is 50 cm[mathjaxinline]^{2} [/mathjaxinline]. Due to the pressure of the gas, the piston moves outward by a small distance [mathjaxinline]dx = 1[/mathjaxinline]mm. Assume that the presssure changes are negligible during the expansion. Determine the work done by the system in joule [ J ].
